Replies.Reply: You did well out there. You've got something, Liang. Potential, yeah?
Don't spend it all in once place.
Hold on, hold on. What did he say?
No, tell him to stay there. Tell them both to stay there.
I'm coming over.
He still in there?
Well maybe you didn't try hard enough.
When was the last time you slept?
No.
You know where he is now?
You go. I'm gonna look around. See if I can find him.
Go on.
Which way'd he go?
You seen Billy?
Well if he comes in, tell him I'm looking for him, yeah?
What is it?
What?
What happened?
Hello Mum.
Hello?
Hi Mum. Where are you?
What?
Maybe. Take your pick. Billy wasn't popular.
I'll make sure it gets done.
Yeah, okay, I'll do it.
Ask him if he's Choi Yan Lee.
Ask him why he killed my brother.
What's he saying?
Who did that to him?
What's he saying?
Tell me.
How does he do that?
Ask him who cut his hand off.
Do it.
What's he saying?
What did he say?
It's a little bit more complicated than that Mum.
Why?
Nothing.
I want you to meet my Mum.
When did you last see him?
Did he have any enemies?
Who?
This his phone?
What is it?
No, I'll talk to them.
Good morning officers. How can I help you?
Never heard of him.
I run a boxing club. Not much call for one armed men.
What's this got to do with me?
Sure, sorry. What do you want to know?
You want to speak to her?
Am I suspect?
I want you to find out who that guy is.
Now.
The one who killed my brother.
I came here to kill you.
Yes.
My mother wants me to kill you.
Thai style.
You can't wear that.
She hates red. Come on, we'll get you something else.
Come on.
Look, I'm telling you. It's easier this way. Trust me.
It's Mai, Mum.
A year and a half isn't it?
I saw her walking down the street.
And I thought - this is the most beautiful girl I've ever seen - so I just walked up to her and started talking.
Mum, stop it, for fuck's sake.
Leave her alone Mum. You've got her wrong. She's a good girl.
Mum!
The cops came by my club today.
They're investigating a murder. The guy that killed Billy turned up dead this morning.
I know it was you, Mum.
He was there. He was with them.
The Angel of Vengeance.
No.
- his name is Chang-
Mum, don't talk to her like that.
Me.
-- So you sent him to me and what could I do?
I did what I could. And that's more than you ever did.
And what did that get him? I'll tell you what, a one way ticket to this fucking place, just like me.
I'm only here 'cause of you. If you didn't exist, I wouldn't be here.
Don't you think I know that? And look at me now. I'm a front for a drugs smuggling.
That's right Mum. That's what's more important to you. But what about me?
Is that what happened with Billy? Did Billy become a problem like I did?
I'm not going to kill him for you, Mum.
'Cause I'm going to fight him. In the ring. Me versus him.
I don't expect you to understand. Cause you don't understand anything that isn't about you.
You never did, Mum.
I'm fine.
I'll be fine. In a minute.
Sorry about that.
Seeing when it hurts.
Didn't you like what I got you?
What do you mean?
Don't to be so hard on her. Her life hasn't been easy.
Don't say that, okay? You don't know what you're talking about. She'd do anything for me.
Don't go there.
You don't get to judge her. You think she's bad? You should've met my dad.
How much do I owe you?
Come on.
What are you talking about?
Yeah, well I lost.
Nothing. I don't feel anything at all.
What do you want, Mum?
What's wrong Mum?
What's wrong?
Who does?
Chang?
What did you do, Mum? What did you do?
We're outside.
I need you here. Right now.
Okay.
Let's make a move.
What's it say?
The Angel Of Vengeance.
No way.
Who said?
My mother?
What kind of a mother says that?
No. We're not doing it.
Only God forgives. And now mother -
Where's is she?
What did she say? What did she promise you?
Right now.
Don't hurt her.
You're not going to cause another ruckus in my club now - are you?
His brother didn't pay.
Now it's your problem.
You don't pay his debt - you don't enter.
Like I always said. One day he's going to meet the devil.
Sure--?
So? That's his problem.
I'm with you mate. Billy's fucked--
Julian?
Look, get dressed and I'll see you downstairs.
What do we do?
Are we going to kill him or what?
What are you doing?
Well, we're supposed to be moving five keys out the end of this week. But Billy's not here, is he?
I know how to do what needs to be done.
Never come back - you understand me?
You're a fighter, kid. No doubt about it. Good luck with that.
Sure. No problem.
Nice evening?
Who?
You can't just going round killing cops here anymore. It's not that easy.
Sorry mate, something's come up.
Didn't she tell you?
You alright mate? D'you want something?
We're good mates aren't we?
Don't make this harder--
You've become a liability. You can see that, can't you?
And now she wants me to take over. She wants me to be the favoured son. What am I supposed to say?
I didn't want it to end like this. First I fuck your mother. Then I--
Not this evening.
He's not coming in. I tell him to stay away. He hurt one of my girls Julian.
Who is that guy?
Is he a cop?
Then why's he going to fight the Westerner?
And if he loses?
Is this your daughter?
How could you?
How could you let this happen?
Well now's your chance.
Do what thou will.
What are you sorry for?
Answer the question. What are you sorry for?
And why did you do that?
And why did he do that?
How old was she?
You knew what she was doing and you did nothing.
This isn't about her. This is about your other three daughters and making sure you don't forget them.
I know.
The sheriff he asked me Why I had run And then it came to me Just what I had done And all for no reason Just one piece of lead I hung my head I hung my head.
Come on. They haven't got a jail big enough. Look at the size of him.
But he blew down all their houses. Would you want to keep a pet that could do that?
How could they be sure he wouldn't do it again?

"And so the king and the fairies that lived in the village said to the creature: this is your mark which will stay with you forever. If you ever try and blow down our village again, it will heat up until it boils your brains, for it has magical properties. Go in peace.
The taste of love is sweet When hearts like ours meet I fell for you like a child Oh, but the fire went wild.
The Cops watch with total devotion.
This is not the man.
Why are you here?
Who?
I love all living things.
I restore karma. Is that why you came?
What's stopping you?
Would you like me to tell you?
You want the Angel of Vengeance.
Why?
Yes you do.
And what do you want?
You want to fight me?
View.
Table.
Yes. I like the table.
I need to speak to you in Thai.
I love you.
Do you want to die? Do you want me to kill you? For what you've done?
Tell me why not. Tell me why I shouldn't shoot you as soon as you come out of that door.
Not good enough.
I know that. You're wearing sandals.
Give me a reason.
You showed no mercy in there. Why should mercy be shown to you?
Yes you do.
But you know where he is.
You know why we're here.
Don't talk unless I ask you to.
Do you have anything to say for yourself?
And I told you not to talk unless I asked you.
I never said that.
This him?
Where do I find him?
I'm taking your phone.
Can you turn the music off. It won't be long, I promise.
I need information.
And you're going to help me.
Whether you like it or not.
Why?
Who was she?
How did she know me?
And what's my name?
I see the way you look at my people.
We both know that I'm not what you, you need.
But above all this, I wish you love.
I will always love you.
It wasn't you, was it?
You're innocent.
It's not your fault.
What happened to the princess' head?
I thought the King banished them all from his kingdom?
Nothing's wrong. Go to sleep.
You sure it's her?
What's your name?
What floor?
No.
GET OUT OF THE APARTMENT!
Let's go.
Get up.
Get up. Now.
Do you have anything to say?
Do you have anything to say?
What do you expect me to do?
Come on.
When you were born - what's the first thing you remember seeing?
What do you remember?
And do you ever see light?
Good.
Go with God.
Almost heaven, West Virginia Blue ridge mountains Shenandoah river -
All my memories gathered round her Miners lady, stranger to blue water Dark and dusty, painted on the sky Misty taste of moonshine Teardrops in my eye.
Country roads, take me home to the place I belong West Virginia, mountain momma Take me home, country roads..

West Virginia, mountain momma Take me home, country roads As one of the Custom's Officers puts on a rubber glove, Jenna starts to scream out obscenities at them. Mask off, a real monster underneath, flailing around for all to see.
Yes.
I didn't do anything.
You missed my turning. I live that way.
I'm so sorry. Please. Please. Please don't hurt me. I'm so sorry.
I killed the Westerner?
He killed my daughter.
How else can we make money? Four daughters. No sons. What else could I do?
What did you expect me to do? You have to have pity on me. My daughter's just been murdered.
I won't forget. I promise. Forgive me.
I'll change. I'll be a better man.
You can't kill me. I'm a cripple.
He murdered my daughter.
Oh God. Please don't kill me. Please.
I've paid for what I did. Don't you see?
He told me to do it. Then he took my hand. Look.
I'm telling the truth. It was the Angel of Vengeance.
The Angel of Vengeance. Yes. You don't find the Angel of Vengeance. No. He finds you.
I'm telling you the truth. He'll find you.
We'll get you there.
We're investigating the murder of Choi Yan Lee.
His arm was cut off. Here.
He was the father of the girl that was found dead with your brother.
That's why we're here Mr Hopkins. If you could just answer our questions.
Where were you last night?
That wont be necessary at the moment.
What about his brain?
He has to do it. Since he came out of the coma, that's what he's done.
Get up. Please get up.
They wont disturb us.
Top.
When are you leaving?
And your other son - is he going with you?
You watched him fight.
Put him in jail.
Keep him as a pet?
What if they just let him go?
The monsters were angry. They bit it off.
These were new monsters. The woods are full of them.
What's wrong Dad?
What happened?
Sorry I'm late.
What's wrong?
See anyone you want us to take home tonight?
What?
What's with you? You want to get high?
Is she here?
D'you want me to?
Why d'you want me to meet her?
What, like we're a couple?
What is it?
Why not?
You're kidding?
This is insane.
I work in the service industry.
I should be going now.
Are you alright?
What are you doing?
I'm going to go.
Maybe you should give it to your mother.
Come on Julian. She's a fucking bitch.
The way she talks to you --
What? 'Don't talk about my mother'?
Why don't you fuck her instead of me?
You're fucked.
Fuck you.
What happened to you?
Who did this to you?
Now?
Let's go.
Five minutes.
I'd like to check in now please.
I'd like to speak to your manager.
How much?
Don't leave the money there. Some cunt'll nick it. Put it in your pocket.
Put it in your pocket.
Put it in your fucking pocket.
I need a drink.
Do you want to see a picture?
What, yeah, thanks.
Could it be have been one of the gangs?
What do you mean?
But you're going to find out who did it, right?
No, it needs to be you that does it.
Good.
Did you kill him?
Don't tell me to calm down. I want him dead.
We don't forgive. Only God does.
How?
What are you talking about?
I don't care.
Just don't - some Thai cunt murdered your brother and we're not going to let him get away with it.
'Restores' things? Who said anything about 'restoring' things?
How's business?
What d'you mean?
I'm here. Julian's here.
Nothing?
So we kill them both.
Okay. Well how about we start with the guy we do know?
How long have you two known each other then?
Well it's always a rare treat to meet one of Julian's lady friends.
So, where did you two meet?
I bet you do. But tell me Mai, before you started serving my son, how many cocks were you serving? Was it over a thousand?
I know girls like you. Just because you might be pulling the wool over my son's eyes don't think it's going to work with me.

I'm sorry Julian, but I won't stand by and let a dirty little hooker take advantage of my son in the vain hope that her womb isn't so diseased that she can trick him into impregnating her and putting another cocksucking child on to this earth.
What do you know about what's good?
Well that's nice isn't it, I'm really happy for you--
I did what had to be done.
Who?
D'you kill him?
Cause he as good as killed Billy. What I want to know is, what are you going to do about it?
Yes you are. You're going to do it for me and you're going to do it for your brother.
Chang?!
Sit down you cunt.
So what am I left with?
You're right. We're family. We stick together. But Billy was family too.
That's it. I'm not listening to this.
You could have protected him.
I would've done anything for him. Okay, he wasn't born with as many advantages as you were. He struggled with things.
Don't you dare blame me for what happened back then.
At least you're not behind bars and that's more important to me.
Surprise me.
And when you lose, what's going to happen then?
Do you understand what he's talking about? 'Cause I haven't got a fucking a clue.
I hope you find what you're looking for.
Nice to meet you Mai. Hope to see you again soon.
Lovely, yeah. Just catching up, you know.
You're a piece of work, aren't you?
No fucking hanging about with you, is there?
I bet you do.
We'll have to something about that the, wont we? But, first things first, what about Chang?
My son's guardian angel.
Good, then he won't be to hard to kill, will he?
What did you have in mind?
I didn't say it was easy. But then, you're a resourceful man, aren't you?
Well then you're going to have to find someone who's not a fucking Thai then, aren't you?
You really want to know?
He killed my son.
This is Bangkok. Nothing's that expensive.
He doesn't want to see anyone.
Of course.
We'll get him through this together.
I'll never get use to seeing you get hurt - even when you win.
And did it make a difference?
And how do you feel now?
He's going to come after me. And after he's come after me, he's going to come after you.
I'm scared, Julian.
What are we going to do?
Not just him. We've got to take them all out.
Kill them all. The final solution.
I came here to collect my son's body.
Tonight.
I've had no real contact with Julian since he ran away.
I watched him lose. And he deserved to.
I'll never testify against my own flesh and blood, Officer Chang. But he's a killer.

You don't have to. I will.

I'm begging you. Please--

Wait. You said if I took you to him you'd let me live.
